data: David Shiner, Ph.D David Shiner, Ph.D Professor (940) 565-3874 shiner@unt.edu Phyisics 305 Ph.D (University of Michigan, 1988) Research interest: Optics. Atomic physics; laser spectroscopy; precision measurement. Dr. David Shiner uses percision laser techniques to measure fundamental properties of atoms to incredible precision and accuracy in order to test experimentally fundamental theories of Quantum Electrodynamics.
